title: Dark Futures: Tales of Dystopia SF
description: "Hold onto your head! Editor Jason Sizemore loads a shotgun with futuristic stories, puts the barrel against your brain and pulls the trigger... Standouts in this sf anthology include James Reilly's Terra Tango 3, Jennifer Pelland's Personal Jesus, and Michele Lee's Meat World. These stories are cutthroat, sinister, sometimes lonely and always disturbing."-Jeff Carlson, international bestselling author of Plague Zone
author: Kelli Owen
